text:
[Verse]
Stars are shining bright
In the moonlit night
We can touch the sky
You and I

[Verse 2]
Whispers in the wind
Hearts begin to spin
Feel the magic rise
In our eyes

[Chorus]
Midnight skies above
Falling deep in love
Hold my hand and see
Eternity

[Verse 3]
Steps on hidden trails
Chasing firefly tales
Lost in you and me
So free

[Chorus]
Midnight skies above
Falling deep in love
Hold my hand and see
Eternity

[Bridge]
Dance till morning light
In the star-filled night
Never wanting this
Moment's bliss
title: Midnight Skies
